comments.creator: jacob.benoit.1@gmail.com
comments.text: Ouch, I just received a million bugmail. Anyway, tracking bugs are only really suited to things that complete in finite time. For tracking ongoing tasks that could remain open for a long time, it's generally considered better to use a bugzilla whiteboard/keyword. Maybe it's time to close this tracking bug now, as it's been open for two years and much of what was initially considered to be needed for it, has since been fixed.

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Luke from comment #2)
> Please add Bug 1134263

The bug, unless I've misunderstood, does indeed look like it could impact games in a major way on some platforms. Added, thanks for commenting.
